code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';var initialState={searchValue:'',CategoryId:0,currentPage:1,sort:{name:'популярности',sortProperty:'rating'}};var filterSlice=createSlice({name:'CategoryId&Sort',initialState:initialState,reducers:{setSearchValue:function setSearchValue(state,action){state.searchValue=action.payload;},setCategoryId:function setCategoryId(state,action){state.CategoryId=action.payload;},setSort:function setSort(state,action){state.sort=action.payload;},setCurrentPage:function setCurrentPage(state,action){state.currentPage=action.payload;},setParams:function setParams(state,action){state.CategoryId=Number(action.payload.CategoryId);state.currentPage=Number(action.payload.currentPage);state.sort=action.payload.sort;}}});export var selectFilter=function selectFilter(state){return state.filterSlice;};var _filterSlice$actions=filterSlice.actions,setCategoryId=_filterSlice$actions.setCategoryId,setSort=_filterSlice$actions.setSort,setCurrentPage=_filterSlice$actions.setCurrentPage,setParams=_filterSlice$actions.setParams,setSearchValue=_filterSlice$actions.setSearchValue;export{setCategoryId,setSort,setCurrentPage,setParams,setSearchValue};export default filterSlice.reducer;
